replies.author: HJ_KISS
replies.txt_content:
[娱乐|讯息]AnimBoard——免费版动态计分表[1.7.x—1.8.x]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=558085
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)
[其他]FeatherBoard —— 像国外服务器一样带动画的积分榜[1.6.4-1.8.x]
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=533879
(出处: http://www.mcbbs.net/)

这两种都可以做到图片上的效果..
